channel.title: How to change welcome text
channel.description: Hey i need help im running on SoulSplit's source and i dont know how to change welcome text i searched in client for it where it usually is but its not there.. it tells at the welcome text this [code]Welcome to Soul Split. We need donations harder than ever! type ::donate Donators get their items back! For 99 Str,Atk,Mage,Range,HP use ::pure or if u want to go to the rock crabs use ::train[/code]

item.title: How to change welcome text
item.dc:creator: @Hunterme2 Hunterme2
item.description:
@Hunterme2 wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:3, topic:349206”][quote author=Hunterme2 link=topic=445578.msg3271627#msg3271627 date=1279245652]
I use a program called Windows Grep that can search for any text string in any document.

Download the Program here. http://www.wingrep.com/download.htm

When you open the program just follow the search assistant’s instructions, which is EXTREMELY easy to follow.

Have Grep search subfolders and point it to the location of your server/client.

Just have it search the .Java(s) and all the results will be shown.

Here is a link to pictures of how to follow it if you have trouble.

http://img594.imageshack.us/g/68480634.png/

Please give ++rep if I helped and Happy Leeching
[/quote]
Don’t ask for REP, it will only get you into trouble. Secondly, he can’t REP as you need 15 REP to REP someone.[/quote]

Sorry for helping :mad:. Thought someone else would ++rep since I put some effort into a post.
Guess I won’t post on this forum anymore

Read full topic

item.title: How to change welcome text
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Hunterme2, post:2, topic:349206”]I use a program called Windows Grep that can search for any text string in any document.

Download the Program here. http://www.wingrep.com/download.htm

When you open the program just follow the search assistant’s instructions, which is EXTREMELY easy to follow.

Have Grep search subfolders and point it to the location of your server/client.

Just have it search the .Java(s) and all the results will be shown.

Here is a link to pictures of how to follow it if you have trouble.

http://img594.imageshack.us/g/68480634.png/

Please give ++rep if I helped and Happy Leeching ;)[/quote]
Don’t ask for REP, it will only get you into trouble. Secondly, he can’t REP as you need 15 REP to REP someone.

Read full topic

item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Hey i need help im running on SoulSplit’s source
and i dont know how to change welcome text i searched in client for it where it usually is but its not there…
it tells at the welcome text this

Welcome to Soul Split. We need donations harder than ever! type ::donate Donators get their items back! For 99 Str,Atk,Mage,Range,HP use ::pure or if u want to go to the rock crabs use ::train
